articles.title: DPRK FM Spokesman Slams U.S. CIA Director's Remarks
articles.content:
DPRK FM Spokesman Slams U.S. CIA Director's Remarks
Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- A spokesman of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK) gave the following answer to question put by KCNA on July 25, over the fact that the director of the U.S. Central Intelligence Agency (CIA) dared to talk about "removal of the supreme leadership" of the DPRK:
					 On July 20, the U.S. CIA Director Pompeo mentioned impertinently, at a security forum hosted by a civilian organization, about the "removal of the supreme leadership" of the DPRK, saying that what is most dangerous about the north Korean nuclear issue is the character who holds the control over the nuclear weapons and that the intelligence community and the Department of Defense are figuring out the way to separate the weapons from someone who might well have intent to use them.
					
					 Although his reckless remarks are just balderdash of a guy who has become so angrily desperate due to the ever-increasing nuclear strike capability of the DPRK, they have gone over the line, and it has now become clear that the ultimate aim of the Trump administration's hostile policy towards the DPRK is the "regime change" in the DPRK.
					
					 That the person who is supposed to be in charge of all foreign intelligence in the U.S., harbors an illusion that it could separate our army and people from our supreme leadership is an expression of his illiteracy about the DPRK and an explicit illustration of incompetence of the U.S. intelligence community.
					
					 The successive U.S. administrations could not but fail in the DPRK-U.S. confrontation. That is also attributable to the "merits" of such stupid intelligence community of the U.S.
					
					 Our army and people have never thought about their destiny and future separated from their supreme leadership.
					
					 The first and foremost mission of our revolutionary armed forces with the nuclear force as their backbone is to defend the leader at the cost of their lives.
					
					 The DPRK legally stipulates that if the supreme dignity of the DPRK is threatened, it must preemptively annihilate those countries and entities that are directly or indirectly involved in it, by mobilizing all kinds of strike means including the nuclear ones.
					
					 We will find out and smash all those who intend to do something against our supreme leadership, wherever they are. This is an immutable and indomitable will of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 We once again felt deep in our hearts from the reckless remarks of the CIA director how just it was that we have achieved the great historic cause of completing the nuclear force by overcoming all difficulties and trials.
					
					 Should the U.S. dare to show even the slightest sign of attempt to remove our supreme leadership, we will strike a merciless blow at the heart of the U.S. with our powerful nuclear hammer, honed and hardened over time.
					
					 The likes of Pompeo will bitterly experience the catastrophic and miserable consequences caused by having dared to shake their little fists at the supreme leadership, our eternal sun and everything of life for our nation.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Delegation Leaves for Philippines
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Delegation Leaves for Philippines
Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Foreign Ministry led by Vice-Minister Choe Hui Chol left here on Tuesday to visit Philippines.

articles.title: Roving Ambassador of Russian Foreign Ministry Visits DPRK
articles.content:
Roving Ambassador of Russian Foreign Ministry Visits DPRK
Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- Oleg Burmistrov, roving ambassador of the Russian Foreign Ministry, visited the DPRK from July 22 to 25.
					 During the visit, the ambassador paid a courtesy call on Sin Hong Chol, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK and met with the general director for North American Affairs of the Foreign Ministry to exchange views on the situation of the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The DPRK side clarified the principled stand that unless the U.S., which is chiefly to blame for the escalated tension on the Korean peninsula, fundamentally terminates its hostile policy and nuclear threat to the DPRK, the latter would never put its nukes and ballistic missiles on the negotiating table but keep to the road of bolstering up the nuclear force chosen by itself.
					
					 Taking note of such attitude, the Russian side expressed the stand to keep in close touch with the DPRK side and strive for the stability of the peninsula.

articles.title: DPRK Swimming Players Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Swimming Players Back Home
Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- DPRK players came back home Tuesday after taking part in the 17th FINA World Championships held in Hungary from July 14.
					 In the championships Kim Mi Rae and Kim Kuk Hyang of the DPRK placed second at the diving women's 10 meter synchro platform event and Kim Mi Rae and Hyon Il Myong third at the diving mixed 10 meter synchro platform event.

articles.title: Polish Embassy Officials Help Korean Farmers
articles.content:
Polish Embassy Officials Help Korean Farmers
Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- Polish Ambassador to the DPRK Krzysztof Ciebien and his embassy officials did friendship labor at the DPRK-Poland Friendship Jangsuwon Co-op Farm Tuesday.
					 Being briefed on the exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for the farm, the guests looked round the room dedicated to the history of the farm.
					
					 They helped farmers in weeding maize field.
					
					 At a break, they enjoyed an art performance of kindergartners.

articles.title: Japan-Korea Friendship Delegation Arrives Here
articles.content:
Japan-Korea Friendship Delegation Arrives Here
Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- A delegation of Japan-Korea Friendship Linking with Juche led by Toshikazu Suzuki, adviser of the Japanese Tokai Liaison Council for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, arrived here Tuesday.

articles.title: Floral Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- Jong Il Sim, widow of DPRK Hero An Tong Su, visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Tuesday on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 She laid a floral basket before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un
Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from Jong Il Sim, widow of DPRK Hero An Tong Su, with the approach of the 64th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The basket was conveyed to an official concerned by Jong on Tuesday.

articles.title: Oath-taking Meeting of KPA Three Services
articles.content:
Oath-taking Meeting of KPA Three Services
Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- An oath-taking meeting by the service personnel of the Army, Navy and Air and Anti-Air Force of the Korean People's Army took place at the plaza of the Monument to the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War on Tuesday ahead of the 64th anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Present there were Hwang Pyong So, Ri Myong Su, Pak Yong Sik and other commanding officers of the KPA, officers and men of the Army, the Navy and the Air and Anti-Air Force and cadets of the military academies at all levels.
					
					 KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and director of the KPA General Political Bureau, made an address at the meeting.
					
					 He said that the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War was a brilliant one brought about by the Juche-oriented military idea, outstanding strategy and tactics and rare commanding art of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung and a proud one won by dint of ardent patriotism and indomitable fighting spirit of the Korean army and people closely rallied around the Party and the leader.
					
					 He referred to the fact that Generalissimo Kim Jong Il had provided the powerful political and military guarantee for the decisive victory in the sacred war against the U.S. with his Songun revolutionary leadership for more than half a century and turned the DPRK into a political and military power and a full-fledged nuclear weapons state and space power.
					
					 He noted that the history and tradition of the great Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea in which they won only victories in the wars against imperialism and the U.S. is being steadily carried forward under the guidance of respected Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He called for waging more dynamic struggle to add shine to the history of great victory in the war generation after generation and bring July 27 of final victory as early as possible.
					
					 Major Army General Jon Il, Rear Admiral Jang Chol Guk and Major Air General Ho Ryong made pledge speeches on behalf of the service personnel of the three services of the KPA.
					
					 They vowed to carry forward the proud tradition of victory of Songun Korea with the arms of Paektusan.

articles.title: Officials and Members of UAWK Make Study Tour of Mt Paektu Area
articles.content:
Officials and Members of UAWK Make Study Tour of Mt Paektu Area
Hyesan, July 25 (KCNA) -- Officials and primary information workers of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea made a study tour of the revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt Paektu from July 19 to 25 in the run-up to the 64th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 In Pochonbo they laid a floral basket and bouquets at the statue of President Kim Il Sung and paid tribute to him and then went round various battle sites.
					
					 After touring historic battle sites in the area of Mt Paektu, they looked round relics preserved at leader Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp.
					
					 And they met in front of the Samjiyon Grand Monument to vow to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche, started in Mt Paektu, under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 During the study tour, they visited the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station and conducted various political and cultural activities including frontline-style agitation contest and meeting to hear impressions of the reminiscences of anti-Japanese guerrillas.

articles.title: War Museum Draws Many Visitors in DPRK
articles.content:
War Museum Draws Many Visitors in DPRK
Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- Many people of the DPRK are now visiting the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 It was visited by more than 70,000 service personnel of the Korean People's Army, working people, youth and students of at least 500 units including Kim Il Sung University, the Ministry of Electric Power Industry, the State Academy of Sciences and the Taedonggang Beer Factory this month alone. 
					
					 Looking up to the statue of President Kim Il Sung waving back to the columns of the military parade at the square for celebrating the victory in the war, the visitors deeply grasp his feats in leading the war to victory.
					
					 Seeing the photos in the Hero Hall and navy hall, air force hall and others of the museum, they cherish the spirit of devotedly defending the leader and the country and the indomitable fighting spirit displayed by the heroic fighters and people in the rear during the war.

articles.title: Korean Peasants Celebrate War Victory Day
articles.content:
Korean Peasants Celebrate War Victory Day
Samjiyon, July 25 (KCNA) -- Officials of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea and agricultural workers gave an art performance at the Samjiyon County Hall of Culture on Tuesday to celebrate the 64th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Put on the stage were colorful numbers including chorus "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung" and "July 27 March" and male chorus "We Have Won" and female solo "Thinking of Journeys for Songun Leadership".
					
					 Performers sang high praises of President Kim Il Sung's feats for the victory in the war and the Songun revolutionary exploits of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They impressively represented the heroic merits of the Korean army and people who defended every inch of the country at the cost of their blood during the war.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Patriotism, Dynamics for Building Socialist Power
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Patriotism, Dynamics for Building Socialist Power
Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- It has been five years since respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un made public his immortal work "Let Us Step up the Building of a Thriving Country by Applying Kim Jong Il's Patriotism".
					 The work, published on July 26, Juche 101 (2012), calls upon all the people to turn out in the drive for achieving the prosperity of the country, cherishing Kim Jong Il's patriotism, the most vivid expression of socialist patriotism.
					
					 Since its publication, the work has served as an immortal guideline in inspiring the people with enthusiasm for the revolution and struggle and patriotism in their general advance for accomplishing the cause of building a powerful socialist nation.
					
					 The DPRK has showed the actual war capability of new-type strategic weapons, which was climaxed with the successful test-fire of intercontinental ballistic rocket Hwasong-14. All these achievements are the precious fruition of patriotic enthusiasm displayed by the Korean people.
					
					 The noble spiritual world of the Korean people and their strong patriotism can be well evidenced by a story about a paraplegic worker who has performed unknown feats for over 30 years and the reality of the Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill which was turned into a model unit.
					
					 All these facts show that Kim Jong Il's patriotism is, indeed, the soul and sentiment of the Korean people and serves as the dynamics for building a thriving socialist country.

articles.title: Model Company Movement Waged during War
articles.content:
Model Company Movement Waged during War
Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- Soldiers of the Korean People's Army (KPA) displayed the indomitable spirit of defending the country and popular heroism during the Fatherland Liberation War (June 25, 1950-July 27, 1953) to defeat the U.S. imperialists.
					 In order to convey their great feats to posterity, the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum was built on the bank of the River Pothong in Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK. What draws attention of visitors there is a data that myriads of model soldiers were produced in KPA units for a year since March 1952 and they performed great feats.
					
					 During the war, the model company movement was brisk among KPA units as part of a mass movement for strengthening the company, the main combat unit. The movement had brought about a great surge in the combat capability of companies and spiritual strength of their soldiers.
					
					 The flag for the first model company went to the second company of the first battalion of 30th regiment under the Andong 12th Infantry Division of the KPA for killing or wounding thousands of enemies in less than two years since the start of the war and producing three heroes including Kang Ho Yong.
					
					 Many tales of heroism shown by KPA soldiers were highlighted by newspaper "Joson Inmingun", the KPA Front Command's organ "For Victory" and other mass media. Among them are the one about an artillery officer who commanded the battle on the coast of Wonsan to sink two destroyers and several warships and thus foil the enemy's landing operation and another about those who took the lead in assaults and sacrificed themselves for the Party and the leader, the fatherland and the people.
					
					 As the heroic Korean People's Army, indeed, reliably defended the fatherland, the U.S. imperialists were forced to kneel down before the Korean people.

articles.title: Wartime Song Performance of Women
articles.content:
Wartime Song Performance of Women
Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- Officials and members of the Socialist Women's Union of Korea staged a performance of wartime songs in the Rungna People's Pleasure Park here on Tuesday to celebrate the 64th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 It was enjoyed by Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice chairman of the C.C., WPK, officials concerned, officials and members of the women's union.
					
					 The numbers of the performance included narration and chorus "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung", trio and chorus "Three Years of War", chorus "Song of National Defence" and poem "Motherland".
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the undying feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, who led the hard-fought Fatherland Liberation War and the struggle for defending socialism to brilliant victory and turned the DPRK into a world-level military power and a full-fledged nuclear weapons state and thus provided sure guarantee for eternal prosperity.
					
					 They also impressively represented the struggle and optimistic life of the Korean women who had heroically fought for the victory in the war at the front and rear.

articles.title: Camping Starts at Songdowon International Children's Camp
articles.content:
Camping Starts at Songdowon International Children's Camp
Wonsan, July 25 (KCNA) -- The 32nd camping began at the Songdowon International Children's Camp in the DPRK with due ceremony on Tuesday.
					 Present at the ceremony were officials concerned and camping groups of children from the DPRK, Russia, Indonesia and China and a camping group of overseas Korean children.
					
					 The participants laid floral baskets and bouquets at the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il at the camp.
					
					 A congratulatory speech and a report were made at the ceremony.
					
					 The speakers warmly welcomed the campers, hoping that they would spend pleasant and memorable days in good health.
					
					 They expressed belief that those schoolchildren from different countries would deepen their friendship, dreaming a peaceful and beautiful world, during the camping.

articles.title: National Exhibition of Sundry Goods Opens
articles.content:
National Exhibition of Sundry Goods Opens
Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- The 6th National Exhibition of 206 Sundry Goods opened in Pyongyang.
					 On display there are more than 3,000 goods of over 350 kinds made at daily necessities production units under ministries and national institutions and each provincial industrial management bureau.
					
					 Its opening ceremony took place on Tuesday at the mass consumption goods exhibition of the Ministry of Food and Consumer Goods Industries.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Attempt to Deny Past Crimes Flailed
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Attempt to Deny Past Crimes Flailed
Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun carries a commentary Tuesday, 110 years since the fabrication of the "Jongmi 7-point Treaty" for aggression by the Japanese imperialists.
					 The "Ulsa 5-point Treaty" was a brigandish treaty by which the Japanese imperialists usurped the diplomatic right of Korea and the "Jongmi 7-point Treaty" was an aggression treaty which deprived the feudal Korean government of even its right to domestic administration that had remained only in mere form, the commentary says.
					
					 Citing facts to prove that the "Jongmi 7-point Treaty" was manipulated in the most vicious and illegal way, it goes on:
					
					 Still remaining in the mind of the Korean nation is the deep-rooted rancor against the Japanese imperialists which inflicted misfortune and pain during their colonial rule over Korea.
					
					 But the Japanese reactionaries seized by the militarist ambition are persistently distorting and denying their hideous crimes against the Korean nation.
					
					 By nature, Japan loathes to repent of its crimes historically, and it has such inveterate bad habit of justifying those crimes.
					
					 A criminal has the intent to repeat the past crimes when he does not repent of his sins and is not ready to turn over a new leaf of his life.
					
					 Herein lies the danger of the shameless acts of Japan going desperate to deny the past crimes of aggression.
					
					 Another reason sought by the Japanese reactionaries in denying the past crimes is to evade the responsibility for the legal reparation. They are mistaken if they think they can evade reparation by denying the history of crimes.
					
					 Japan should know that the more shamelessly it behaves, the stronger hatred and revenge of the army and people of the DPRK will grow.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Terms S. Korean Forces Group of Traitors
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Terms S. Korean Forces Group of Traitors
Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities are mulling bringing into south Korea U.S. Cargo Ship Lane Victory.
					 The ship is a crime-ridden ship as it took to south Korea a great number of citizens from the north through A-bomb scare. It was one of those ships which the U.S. imperialists mobilized for the "Hungnam withdrawal operation" when they were put to rout as the People's Army made re-advance during the last Korean War.
					
					 The puppet forces plan to bring the heap of scrap iron, on the verge of being disposed of as scrapped material in the U.S., to Koje Island, calling it "symbol of south Korea-U.S. alliance", and are now trumpeting about building a memorial park meant to "remind the visitors of the miracle of Hungnam withdrawal and meaning of peace".
					
					 Blasting off the ship would not be enough to give vent to the wrath and grudge born by the Korean nation. Yet, the senseless traitors without an iota of blood and soul of the nation are going to buy it at the expense of billions of won and incite submission to the U.S.
					
					 Such act of serving the U.S., which imposed untold holocaust and disaster on the Korean nation, as "benefactor" is an intolerable insult and mockery of all Koreans.
					
					 As for the "Hungnam withdrawal operation", it was recorded as the one in which the U.S. troops took to flight after leaving not only their combat and technical hardware but also their fellows who became terribly frozen after sustaining the bitterest defeat in its history of wars of aggression by the Lake Jangjin at the end of 1950.
					
					 The GIs appeased thousands of DPRK citizens into boarding the ship, because they needed "human shields" for saving their lives.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists were never "savior" nor "apostle of peace" in view of the heinous murderous crimes they committed in the southern half of Korea during the Korean War.
					
					 The peaceable citizens were mercilessly massacred at the order of firing into all evacuees, all those in white clothes. The U.S. imperialists killed 147,000 people in Seoul only from September 1950 to February 1951 just before retreat.
					
					 Those who were massacred in south Korea during the war number more than 1.24 million.
					
					 A French paper commented that "biggest monstrous act in the 20th century was committed in Korea by GIs", over the fact that the U.S. imperialist ogres skinned heads of patriots and kept them as "souvenirs".
					
					 However, the south Korean pro-U.S. stooges eulogize the monsters with such rhetoric as "noble sacrifice" and "supreme humanitarian operation" and even plan to bring the ship stained with blood of the Korean nation and educate south Koreans in sycophancy and submission.
					
					 It is the shame on the nation that the puppet forces are beautifying the gangsters as "saviors".
					
					 The south Korean authorities should stop the treacherous act at once, clearly understanding that they will be cursed and censured as traitors to the nation generation after generation, should they introduce the ship.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Exposes U.S. as Aggressor and Plunderer
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Exposes U.S. as Aggressor and Plunderer
Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, Trump, through the trade mission, officially informed the south Korean authorities that the negotiations for FTA were to be resumed.
					 Rodong Sinmun comments Tuesday that such a unilateral declaration on renegotiations is little short of putting pressure on the south Korean authorities.
					
					 It says:
					
					 Such an act clearly shows the aggressive and predatory nature of the U.S. which makes no scruple of trampling on the dignity of its colonial servant for its own interests.
					
					 As for the south Korea-U.S. FTA, its conclusion was made by traitor Lee Myung Bak under the pressure of the U.S. So, it is a treacherous agreement that makes the economy of south Korea thoroughly dependent on the monopolistic capital of the U.S. and violates the vital rights and interests of its people.
					
					 Due to this humiliating "agreement", the agro-stock market, marine products market and public service were completely opened and U.S. monopolistic capital and goods found their free way to south Korea.
					
					 The negotiations of FTA demanded by the U.S. is nothing but a pitfall of subordination and death as it will push the south Korean economy and people's livelihood into the worst destitution.
					
					 This being a hard fact, the south Korean authorities are adopting a humiliating attitude, not pleading against the unjust demand.
					
					 If the FTA is revised as wished by the U.S., the economy of south Korea will be reduced into a worse colonial contract one and its people's living into a miserable plight.
					
					 No matter how loudly the south Korean ruling forces talk about "alliance" with the U.S., the latter regards them as no more than its colonial servant.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Act of Serving U.S. Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Act of Serving U.S. Slammed
Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities plan to introduce into south Korea the U.S. merchant ship Rein Victory, which is on the verge of disposal as scrap iron in the U.S., at huge expenses while calling it "meaning of peace" and "souvenir", says Minju Joson Tuesday in a commentary.
					 The ship produced a great number of separated families. It was used for taking citizens of the DPRK to south Korea at a time when the U.S. imperialists posed A-bomb scare as they were forced to retreat by the Korean People's Army during the Korean War, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The south Korean authorities mull bringing into south Korea the crime-woven ship, a senseless act of traitors bereft of even an iota of blood and soul of the nation.
					
					 It is the deep-seated bad habit of the south Korean puppet forces to take to flunkeyism while serving the U.S. 
					
					 The successive puppet rulers ranging from traitors Syngman Rhee to Park Geun Hye all left dirty and shameful record through sycophancy and submission.
					
					 It is the shame on the nation that the south Korean puppet forces are getting keen to stifle the fellow countrymen in the north with whom they share the same blood, while serving the U.S. which imposed only unspeakable disaster and holocaust on the Korean nation as "benefactor".
					
					 Those who take to flunkeyism are bound to become idiots as they would eulogize robber as savior and regard heap of scrap iron as treasure.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should immediately stop the dirty act of treachery, clearly understanding that the introduction of the ship will incur curse and censure of the nation generation after generation.

articles.title: S. Korea: Farmers' Organizations Accuse Authorities of Breaking Election Commitments
articles.content:
S. Korea: Farmers' Organizations Accuse Authorities of Breaking Election Commitments
Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean online newspaper Chamsesang, the Federation of Peasants Associations in south Korea issued a statement on July 20 in denunciation of the authorities for breaking their election commitments such as rice price hike.
					 The statement accused the chief executive of reneging on his election commitment in one hundred days though he pledged to accelerate the reform of farmland through the revision of law.
					
					 It stressed that the "government" agricultural policy is as same as Lee Myung Bak's and Park Geun Hye's.
					
					 The Federation of Women Peasants Associations, too, released a similar statement on July 21.

articles.title: Crimes Increase on Railroad in S. Korea
articles.content:
Crimes Increase on Railroad in S. Korea
Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Yonhap News reported on July 23 that crimes are on increase on the railroad of south Korea, quoting data of the Ministry of Statistics.
					 According to the data, more than 1,600 cases of crimes such as sexual assault, robbery, violence and arson occurred in trains and station yards last year.
					
					 The above-said crimes have rapidly increased since 2009, period of traitor Lee Myung Bak's office.

articles.title: Struggle for Prisoners of Conscience Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Struggle for Prisoners of Conscience Staged in S. Korea
Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- A rally and a demo took place in Seoul on July 22 in demand of the release of prisoners of conscience, according to the south Korean online paper Voice of People.
					 The participants in the rally urged the authorities to set free all the prisoners of conscience on the occasion of August 15.
					
					 So long as the prisoners are behind the bars, society would not be free, they said, expressing their resolve to march up to Chongwadae for democracy and human rights every day until Aug. 15.

articles.title: Exploits of Kim Il Sung Lauded Abroad
articles.content:
Exploits of Kim Il Sung Lauded Abroad
Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- Remembrance meetings were held in Bangladesh, Myanmar, Nepal, Iran, Guinea, Bulgaria, Finland and Venezuela between July 4 and 8 to commemorate the 23rd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The chairman of the C.C., Workers' Party of Bangladesh who is minister of Civil Aviation and Tourism of Bangladesh said that many statesmen are said to have worked for people, but it is only President Kim Il Sung who built a society where people are the master of everything and everything serves them.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the Yangon Regional Executive Committee of the Myanmar's National League for Democracy said that the great exploits performed by Kim Il Sung, who enjoys boundless reverence from the whole mankind, for the cause of anti-imperialist independence will shine century after century.
					
					 The chairman of the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea said that Kim Il Sung is a rare thinker-theoretician and outstanding statesman as he brightly showed the road ahead of mankind by founding the Juche idea.
					
					 The general coordinator of the Federal Political Secretariat of the United Left Party of Venezuela stressed that the feats of Kim Il Sung who made enormous contributions to the human cause of independence will remain forever in the history of the socialist movement and he will be always alive in the mind of mankind.
					
					 Letters to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un were adopted at a meeting in Finland.

articles.title: DPRK's Successful ICBM Test-launch Hailed Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Successful ICBM Test-launch Hailed Abroad
Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Austria and Nigeria released statements on July 6 and 8 in celebration of the DPRK's successful test-launch of ICBM Hwasong-14.
					 The Youth Group for Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism formed in Austria said in its statement that the DPRK, possessed of nukes and ICBM, is a country with tremendous military strength no one can dare to provoke.
					
					 The U.S. and other Western countries' persistent military pressure and sanctions on the DPRK proved futile and the anti-DPRK policy, which had lasted for over half a century, came to failure, it said, adding:
					
					 We are sure that the DRPK will as ever continue to bolster up its defence capabilities, speed up the building of an economic giant and achieve the reunification of the country without fail.
					
					 The Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association in its statement said that the DPRK could finally frustrate the U.S. threat of aggression by possessing H-bomb and its carrier ICBM, and extended full support and solidarity to the just cause of the Korean people.

articles.title: MINREX de la RPDC condena disparates del director de la CIA
articles.content:
MINREX de la RPDC condena disparates del director de la CIA
Pyongyang, 25 de julio (ACNC) -- A la pregunta formulada hoy por la ACNC en relacion con que el director de la Agencia Central de Inteligencia de EE.UU. se atrevio a mencionar la "eliminacion de la Direccion Suprema" de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio la siguiente respuesta.
					El pasado dia 20, el director de la CIA, Pompeo, hablo de la "eliminacion de la Direccion Suprema" de la RPDC en un forum de seguridad auspiciado por una organizacion civil diciendo que "lo mas peligroso del problema nuclear norcoreano es el caracter de la figura que tiene el control de armas nucleares" y que los servicios de inteligencia y el Departamento de Defensa de EE.UU. estan estudiando la manera de separar "las armas nucleares de alguien que pueda tener la intencion de usarlas".
					
					Si bien estas palabras no pasan de ser un delirio de quien esta rabioso por la escalada de la capacidad de ataque nuclear de la RPDC, sobrepasan el limite y hacen evidente que el objetivo final de la politica hostil anti-RPDC de la administracion Trump es el "cambio del poder".
					
					El hecho de que ese tipejo que supuestamente esta encargado de toda la inteligencia exterior de EE.UU. abriga la ilusion de separar a nuestro ejercito y pueblo de su Direccion Suprema es una expresion de su ignorancia sobre la RPDC y una muestra explicita de la incompetencia del circulo de inteligencia de EE.UU.
					
					Las sucesivas administraciones de EE.UU. no pudieron mas que sufrir fracasos en la confrontacion con la RPDC. Esto se puede atribuir tambien a los "meritos" de tal estupido circulo de inteligencia de EE.UU.
					
					Nuestros militares y habitantes nunca habian pensado en su destino y futuro aparte de su Direccion Suprema.
					
					La defensa a ultranza al Lider es la primera mision de nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias centradas en las nucleares.
					
					La RPDC estipula por la ley que si su maxima dignidad se ve amenazada, debe aniquilar de modo preventivo a los paises y entidades involucrados directa o indirectamente en ello movilizando todos los tipos de medios de ataque, incluso los nucleares.
					
					Buscaremos y liquidaremos a todos los que intenten hacer algo contra nuestra Direccion Suprema, dondequiera que se encuentren ellos. Esto es la voluntad inmutable e indoblegable de nuestro ejercito y pueblo.
					
					A traves de los disparates del director de la CIA, nos sentimos una vez mas en lo profundo de nuestros corazones cuan justo fue que hayamos cumplido la historica causa de completar las fuerzas nucleares superando todas las dificultades y pruebas.
					
					Si EE.UU. se atreve a dar la menor senal del intento de eliminar a nuestra Direccion Suprema, atacaremos sin piedad el corazon de EE.UU. con nuestro poderoso garrote nuclear, forjado y consolidado por largo tiempo.
					
					Los tipejos como Pompeo sentiran en carne propia las consecuencias catastroficas y tragicas de su desafio a nuestra Direccion Suprema, nuestro sol eterno y lo todo de la vida para nuestra nacion.

articles.title: Embajador itinerante de cancilleria rusa visita a Corea
articles.content:
Embajador itinerante de cancilleria rusa visita a Corea
Pyongyang, 25 de julio (ACNC) -- Oleg Burmistrov, embajador itinerante del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Federacion Rusa, realizo del dia 22 al 25 una visita a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Durante su permanencia, el diplomatico ruso hizo una visita de cortesia al vicecanciller coreano Sin Hong Chol y se reunio con el director de America del Norte de la cancilleria coreana para intercambiar las opiniones sobre la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					La parte coreana expuso la posicion de principio de no poner en ningun caso sobre la mesa de negociaciones el arma nuclear y el cohete balistico ni retrocedera ni una pulgada del camino de fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares optado por si mismo, mientras no se eliminen de raiz la politica hostil y la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. contra la RPDC.
					
					La parte rusa atendio a la posicion de la RPDC y expreso su posicion de estrechar las relaciones con la RPDC y esforzarse activamente por la seguridad de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.

articles.title: Efectuado acto de juramento de oficiales y soldados del EPC
articles.content:
Efectuado acto de juramento de oficiales y soldados del EPC
Pyongyang, 25 de julio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 64o aniversario de la gran victoria del pueblo coreano en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, tuvo lugar el dia 25 en la explanada frente al Monumento a la Victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria el acto de juramento de los oficiales y soldados de las fuerzas terrestres, navales, aereas y antiaereas del Ejercito Popular de Corea con la participacion de Hwang Pyong So, Ri Myong Su, Pak Yong Sik y otros comandantes del EPC, los cadetes de las academias militares a todos los niveles.
					El discurso de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC.
					
					El orador subrayo que la victoria en la pasada guerra fue un fruto de la autoctona idea militar, las estrategias y tacticas destacadas y el extraordinario arte de mando militar del Generalisimo Kim Il Sung, y del ardiente patriotismo y el indoblegable espiritu combativo del ejercito y el pueblo coreanos, unidos monoliticamente en torno al partido y al Lider.
					
					Elogio al Generalisimo Kim Jong Il quien practicando durante mas de un medio siglo la direccion sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun, preparo la firme garantia politico-militar por la victoria decisiva en la lucha sagrada antiyanqui y convirtio la RPDC en la potencia politica y militar, la nuclear y la cosmica.
					
					Destaco que gracias al Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Un continuan la historia y la tradicion de la nacion de Kim Il Sung y la Corea de Kim Jong Il, llenas de las victorias en la lucha antiimperialista y antiyanqui.
					
					Exhorto a ostentar de generacion en generacion la gran historia victoriosa al unirse compactamente en torno al Comandante Supremo y luchar con mas dinamismo para adelantar cuanto antes el 27 de julio de la victoria final.
					
					Y en representacion de los oficiales y soldados de las fuerzas terrestres, navales, aereas y antiaereas del EPC, hubo discursos de juramento del mayor general de las fuerzas terrestres Jon Il, el contralmirante Jang Chol Guk y el mayor general de las fuerzas aereas Ho Ryong, quienes decidieron glorificar con el fusil del monte Paektu la tradicion de la victoria orgullosa de la Corea del Songun.

articles.title: Efectuada ceremonia de inicio del campismo internacional en Songdowon
articles.content:
Efectuada ceremonia de inicio del campismo internacional en Songdowon
Wonsan, 25 de julio (ACNC) -- Comenzo el 32o campismo infantil internacional de Songdowon.
					Tuvo lugar el dia 25 la ceremonia de ingreso en el Campamento Internacional de Ninos de Songdowon con la participacion de los funcionarios interesados, los grupos de campistas de Corea, Rusia, Indonesia y China y de los ninos coreanos residentes en ultramar.
					
					En homenaje postumo a los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, los participantes depositaron un cesto y ramos de flores ante sus estatuas de bronce.
					
					Hubo discursos de felicitacion y el informe.
					
					Los oradores felicitaron calidamente a los campistas deseando que ellos pasen dias alegres en el campamento.
					
					Expresaron la seguridad de que como lo fue en el pasado, el campismo de este ano sera una oportunidad para ensanchar la amistad entre los escolares de varios paises que suenan con un mundo pacifico y hermoso.

articles.title: ACNC condena en comentario la entrada de carguero norteamericano en el Sur de Corea
articles.content:
ACNC condena en comentario la entrada de carguero norteamericano en el Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 25 de julio (ACNC) -- Las autoridades surcoreanas tratan de introducir el carguero norteamericano "Rein Victory".
					Es uno de los barcos movilizados por el imperialismo norteamericano en la "operacion de retirada de Hungnam" que tuvo lugar durante el repliegue ante el reavance del Ejercito Popular de Corea en la pasada guerra coreana. 
					
					A bordo del carguero, se trasladaron al Sur de Corea numerosos habitantes norcoreanos por el temor al uso de la bomba atomica por parte de EE.UU.
					
					Considerando como "simbolo de alianza Sur de Corea- EE.UU." ese barco que esta a punto de venderse a precio de chatarra en EE.UU., los titeres surcoreanos quieren trasladarlo a la isla Koje para construir con el "un parque memorial para recordar el milagro de la retirada de Hungnam y el significado de la paz".
					
					Este proyecto de los traidores, que no tienen ni un comino de la sangre ni espiritu de la nacion coreana, tiene el objetivo de inculcar la sumision proyanqui pagando miles de millones de wones (moneda surcoreana) por esa chatarra que merece la voladura para librar del rencor e indignacion a los coreanos.
					
					Son un insulto intolerable y burla imperdonable a la nacion tal comportamiento de los titeres surcoreanos que respetan como "salvador" a EE.UU. que impuso indecibles desgracias y calamidades a los coreanos.
					
					Durante la "operacion de retirada de Hungnam", las tropas norteamericanas, que a finales del ano 1950, sufrieron a la orilla del lago Jangjin la derrota mas amarga en la historia de sus guerras de agresion, se fugaron con toda prisa dejando muchos equipos tecnicos de combate y hasta los cadaveres de sus colegas muertos de frio.
					
					Entonces, ellas se llevaron a su barco a miles de habitantes norcoreanos seducidos porque necesitaban un "escudo humano" que protegiera sus vidas.
					
					En la pasada guerra coreana, ellas nunca habian sido "salvador" ni "apostol de paz".
					
					A las ordenes asesinas como "Disparen a todos los refugiados" y "Maten bombardeando a todos los hombres vestidos de blanco", resultaron muertos solo en el Sur de Corea innumerables habitantes pacificos.
					
					Desde septiembre de 1950 hasta febrero de 1951, tiempo de retirada de las tropas yanquis, fueron asesinadas en Seul mas de 147 mil personas.
					
					En lo que duro la guerra, el numero de muertos en el suelo surcoreano suman mas de un millon 240 mil.
					
					En aquel entonces, un rotativo de Francia escribio que "la peor barbaridad del siglo 20 fue cometida en Corea por las tropas norteamericanas", al reportar el escalofriante incidente en que los asesinos yanquis repartieron como "souvenir" en Seul la piel despellejada de las cabezas de los patriotas.
					
					Sin embargo, los lacayos proyanquis elogian a esas bestias con palabras absurdas como "sacrificio noble" y "operacion humanitaria mas grande". Para colmo, tratan de impartir la educacion en la sumision a grandes potencias introduciendo hasta el carguero norteamericano manchado de la sangre de coreanos.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben cancelar su plan de traer el barco "Rein Victory" al darse cuenta de que si hacen eso, seran estigmatizadas por toda la nacion y las generaciones venideras como vendepatrias de peor calana.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia renegociaciones de TLC impuestas por EE.UU. al Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia renegociaciones de TLC impuestas por EE.UU. al Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 25 de julio (ACNC) -- Hace poco, por conducto de la Representacion de Comercio, Trump notifico oficialmente a las autoridades surcoreanas el inicio de las renegociaciones del "Tratado de Libre Comercio".
					Esta declaracion unilateral significa realmente una imposicion de EE.UU. a la parte surcoreana, adelanta el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual fechado 25 que sigue:
					
					Asi se conocio con toda claridad la naturaleza agresiva y saqueadora de EE.UU. que no vacila en sacrificar el destino de su lacayo colonial para satisfacer sus codicias.
					
					El "Tratado de Libre Comercio" Sudcorea-EE.UU. fue firmado por el traidor Lee Myung Bak rendido a la demanda coercitiva de EE.UU. 
					
					Ese pacto vendepatria somete la economia surcoreana al capital monopolista de EE.UU. y perjudica gravemente el derecho a vivir y los intereses del pueblo surcoreano.
					
					En realidad, quedaron abiertos totalmente en el Sur de Corea los mercados de productos agropecuarios y el sector de servicios donde campean ya el capital monopolista y las mercancias de EE.UU.
					
					Las renegociaciones del "TLC" son la trampa de subyugacion y muerte que arruinaria la economia y la vida del pueblo surcoreano.
					
					Sin embargo, las autoridades surcoreanas asumen la actitud obediente sin hacer ninguna objecion a la injusta demanda de su patron gringo.
					
					Aunque las actuales fuerzas gobernantes del Sur de Corea hablan tanto de la "alianza" con EE.UU., ellas no son mas que sirvientes coloniales para el imperio americano.
